article.title: Plasmmer
article.text:
[zero://Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/15XeFY67fYKCKxQPfeo246ELto2Gff1hAe/1490848996 Joined] the [[ZeroMe]] social network on [[March 30]], [[2017]], and has since become the most active user for 8 days in a row. In [[April 11]] Plasmmer returned to become the most active user, after a moral/philosophy discussion with a user. Suggested a lot of missing resources that famous social networks have, and others that can be exclusive of ZeroMe. Plasmmer is also a owner in the ZeroNerds organization togheter [[mkg20001]].

He always argues that [[ZeroNet]] needs a balance between freedom and sensorship, through a democratic system in which everyone can propose changes and the majority of users should approve.
[zero://Me.Mkg20001.bit/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/15XeFY67fYKCKxQPfeo246ELto2Gff1hAe/1490998890 Plasmmer believe in a future] in which [[ants]] will have a powerfull brain and do communication with humans while living in [[ecosphere]]s.

==Creations==

The proposed video format [[USV]] (Universal Smart Video), the game in development [[Tamigucho]] and the [[Kidsearch]] search engine. By the time this article was written, this user used the photo of the [[Dead Or Alive]] band frontman - [[Pete Burns]] - in his profile, of which he is a fan.
Plasmmer was born on [[April 9]], [[1997]] on [[Brazil]].
